timeline.message: Added MaxResultBuffer property and added methods to handle it in driver
Added Counter Interface with basic implementation, added MaxResultBuffer with Tests
Added correct Project's Formatting and loggers
Fixed bug with MaxResultBuffer parsing, Tweak corresponding Test class
Implemented Counter's reset and increase methods
ResultSet tests added, added required Test Constant and Test Error Message, changed order of MaxResultBufferPropertyDescription Exception,
Fixed few misspellings in MaxResultBufferTest and reverted deleted space in ISQLServerDataSource

Added null and empty String validation to MaxResultBufferParser, made use of StringUtils in MaxResultBufferParser, replaced substring() with endsWith() and charAt(), extracted errorMessage to variable, fixed format of multipliers, added few test cases to MaxResultBufferParserTest, updated setting maxResultBuffer to activeConnectionProperties in SQLServerConnection
Added error message for maxResultBufferInvalidSyntax in SQLServerResource, corrected formatting in SQLServerConnection, extracted switch expression to method, reformatted code
